title: Struggling Sidekick - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls   Wizards
author: Ellianyang   엘리아냥
description:
After a year of marriage, I’m now used on being the hostess of tower.

“It’s so peaceful.”

Today was a really peaceful day. Actually, not just today, but all the time. 

“I hope this will continue in the future.”

Wait, isn’t this… a death flag? 

No way! The story already ended a long time ago and it’s the reality!

But then…

“Miss, the sun is in the middle! Come on, get up.”

“Who are you…..?”

I woke up in someone’s body!>
